contentencoded:
Self-described ‘bird nerd’ Noah Strycker – author of “The Thing With Feathers” (out now) – hits us with a joke that doesn’t quite sing.


Later in the show, catch Noah’s conversation with Brendan about albatross fidelity, chicken eye-wear, and assorted other avian practices.

title: “Hummingbirds” – Noah Strycker
teaser: Self-described ‘bird nerd’ Noah Strycker – author of “The Thing With Feathers” (out now) – hits us with a joke that doesn’t quite sing. Later in the show, catch Noah’s conversation with Brendan about albatross fidelity, chicken eye-wear, and assorted other avian practices.
